steps.title: Before proceeding, please realize that movie hopping is grounds for being banned from the theater or escorted out.
steps.content: Before proceeding, please realize that movie hopping is grounds for being banned from the theater or escorted out. Very rarely you can be arrested for theft of services (similar to shoplifting).

steps.title: Choose a large multi-plex, something with a long hallway that has multiple theaters or even better, multiple floors.
steps.content: Choose a large multi-plex, something with a long hallway that has multiple theaters or even better, multiple floors. Be sure it’s a place that has a ticket taker at the main entrance and not in front of the theater doors.

steps.title: Find the times for the movies online.
steps.content: Find the times for the movies online. Be sure to use a site that lists the length of each movie. You can use a movie hopping schedule application called The Movie Hop or TheaterTag.com to plan a movie schedule.

steps.title: Re-adjust the start times listed by adding 15 minutes, that’s approximately the real start time after all the commercials and trailers have played.
steps.content: Re-adjust the start times listed by adding 15 minutes, that’s approximately the real start time after all the commercials and trailers have played.

steps.title: Factor in the actual length of the movie to the newly adjusted start time, that’s when the movie ends.
steps.content: Factor in the actual length of the movie to the newly adjusted start time, that’s when the movie ends.

steps.title: Take this list to figure out what times are best for certain movies, so that you aren't late!
steps.content: Take this list to figure out what times are best for certain movies, so that you aren't late!

steps.title: Go to the matinée on a weekday, the staff will be minimal and the chances that an usher will be watching theater doors will be slim.
steps.content: Go to the matinée on a weekday, the staff will be minimal and the chances that an usher will be watching theater doors will be slim.

steps.title: Purchase the ticket of the most popular movie you’ve chosen to see that day, be sure to buy it for the time you actually expect to see it since that will be the theater most likely watched by ushers.
steps.content: Purchase the ticket of the most popular movie you’ve chosen to see that day, be sure to buy it for the time you actually expect to see it since that will be the theater most likely watched by ushers.

steps.title: Have your ticket torn and enter like normal, do not act suspicious and don’t look stressed.
steps.content: Have your ticket torn and enter like normal, do not act suspicious and don’t look stressed.

steps.title: Buy your snacks and (optional) enter the theater of the movie you have scheduled to see and repeat throughout your day, just casually walk in and out of the movies at your schedule times.
steps.content: Buy your snacks and (optional) enter the theater of the movie you have scheduled to see and repeat throughout your day, just casually walk in and out of the movies at your schedule times.

steps.title: Enjoy the day of movies, with proper planning you'll be able to see 3 movies for the price of one.
steps.content: Enjoy the day of movies, with proper planning you'll be able to see 3 movies for the price of one.
